alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SANTA ROSA AND SOUTHEASTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Milton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Goulding, Bagdad, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach, Navarre, Pensacola Beach, Navarre Beach, Pea Ridge, Roeville, and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
